DOC.brief_summary: Changes gut microbiomes healthy volunteer follow gluten-free diet ( GFD ) four week study . Per participant , nine stool sample collect : one baseline , four GFD period , four return habitual diet . Microbiome profile determine use 16S rRNA sequence sample next processed taxonomic impute functional composition . Additionally , participant keep 3-day food diary six gut health-related biomarkers measure .
DOC.brief_title: Microbiome Composition Changes 4 Week Gluten-free Diet Challenge
DOC.criteria: healthy participant age > =16 Known gastrointestinal disorder Known food intolerance
